column2: "Na ɔman no tse dɛ ehwinhwimfo a wɔkasa bɔn wɔ EWURADZE asomu: na EWURADZE tsee no
column3: n'ebufuw dzɛwee; na EWURADZE ogya hyewee wɔ hɔn mu
column4: na ɔmeen nseraban no ano noho."

column2: "Na ɔman no sui tɔɔ Moses do; na Moses paa EWURADZE kyɛw
column3: na ogya no dumii."

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ bea no dzin dɛ Tabera: osiandɛ EWURADZE ogya hyewee wɔ hɔn mu."
"Na aforafora nyimpa dodow a wɔwɔ hɔn mu no hɔn kɔn dɔɔ adze: Na Israelmba no so suu bio
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Woana na ɔbɛma hɛn nam ma yeedzi?"

column2: "Yɛkaakaa esunam a yedzii no wɔ Egypt no kwa; efer
column3: nye anamuna
column4: nye fan

column2: "afei dze hɛn kra etwintwam; biribi biribiara nnyi hɔ: yennyi hwee gyedɛ  manna   yi ara na yɛahwɛ."
"Na  manna   no tse dɛ korianda aba
column3: na no ho tse dɛ bedula hyɛ ho."

column2: "Ɔman no kekyinii
column3: na wɔtasetasee
column4: na wɔnyaam no wɔ nwuyambo do
column6: na wɔnoaa no wɔ asɛn mu
column7: na wɔyɛɛ no tatar: na ne dɛw tse dɛ ngo momon ne dɛw."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔbɔsu tɔ gu nseraban no do anadwe a
column3: manna   no so tɔ gu do."

column2: "Na Moses tsee dɛ ɔman no worususu wɔ hɔn ebusua ebusua mu: nyimpa biara ɔwɔ no buw abowano: na EWURADZE n'ebufuw dzɛɛw kɛsenara; na ɔyɛɛ Moses ahomtsew."
"Na Moses see EWURADZE dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ɔwo nye w'akowaa edzi no bɔn? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mennya w'enyim enyimnyam
column4: dɛ edze ɔman yi nyinara adzesoa ato mo do yi?"

column2: "Ana emi na minyinseen ɔman yi nyinara? Emi na mowoo hɔn
column3: na esee me dɛ Tur hɔn wɔ wo koko do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ egya bagyegyefo tur enumfoanoba
column5: fa kɔ asaase a ekaa ho ntam maa hɔn egyanom no do?"

column2: "Henfa na minya nam mema ɔman yi nyinara? Osiandɛ wosu gu mo do
column3: dɛ
column4: Ma hɛn nam

column2: "Mo nko murunntum nnkora ɔman yi nyinara
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ dur dodow ma me."

column2: "Na sɛ dɛm na enye me bedzi no a
column3: mepa wo kyɛw
column4: sɛ menya w'enyim enyimnyam a
column5: ɔnodze oku mbom na ku me; na mma munnhu m'awerɛhow."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Boa Israel mpanyimfo mu eduosuon ano ma me hɔn a inyim dɛ wɔyɛ ɔman no mpanyimfo
column4: nye hɔn do asafohemfo; na fa hɔn bra ehyiadzibuw no ho

column2: "Na mibesian na menye wo abɛkasa wɔ hɔ: na mebɛfa sunsum a ɔwɔ wo do no bi
column3: na medze egu hɔn do; na wɔnye wo aasoa ɔman no adzesoa no
column4: amma woara nko aannsoa."

column2: "Na se ɔman no dɛ
column3: Hom ntsew homho nsie ɔkyena
column4: na hom bedzi nam: osiandɛ hom ekosu egu EWURADZE asomu dɛ
column5: Woana na ɔbɛma hɛn nam ma yeedzi? Oye ma hɛn wɔ Egypt mbom: dɛm ntsi EWURADZE bɛma hom nam

column2: "Nnyɛ da kor na hom bedzi
column3: anaa nda ebien anaa nda enum
column4: nnyɛ dadu

column2: "Mbom bosoom ara mu
column3: ekodu dɛ obefifir hom ahwentokura mu
column4: na ayɛ hom mfon: osiandɛ hom apow EWURADZE a ɔwɔ hom mu no
column5: na hom esu wɔ n'enyim aka dɛ
column6: Ebɛn ntsi na yefii Egypt bae?"

column2: "Na Moses see dɛ
column3: Ɔman a mowɔ hɔn mu yi yɛ anamɔnmufo mpemahaesia; na ɔwo ese dɛ
column4: Mebɛma hɔn nam ma woeedzi no bosoom ara mu."

column2: "Aso wobokuku nguan nye anantwi ama hɔn ma aaso hɔn? Anaa wɔbɔboaboa po mu nam nyinara ano ama hɔn
column3: ma aaso hɔn?"

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Ana woetwa EWURADZE nsa do a? Afei na ibohu kyerɛ dɛ m'asɛm bɛba mu ama wo
column4: anaa ɔnnkɛba mu."

column2: "Na Moses fiir edzi
column3: na ɔkɛkaa EWURADZE n'asɛm no kyerɛɛ ɔman no: na ɔboaa ɔman mpanyimfo no mu mbanyin eduosuon ano
column4: na ɔdze hɔn begyinaa Buw no ho hyiae."

column2: "Na EWURADZE sianee wɔ mununkum no mu
column3: na ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ no
column4: na ɔfaa sunsum a ɔwɔ no do no bi
column5: na ɔdze guu mpanyimfo eduosuon no do: na ɔbaa dɛ
column6: sunsum no baa hɔn do no

column2: "Mbom ɔkaa mbanyin beenu wɔ nseraban no mu
column3: ɔbaako ne dzin nye Eldad
column4: na kor no so ne dzin dze Medad: na sunsum no baa hɔn do; na wɔfora hɔn a wɔkyerɛɛw hɔn no mu dze
column5: na wonnyae nnkɔr Buw no ho: na wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ nseraban no mu."

column2: "Na aberantsɛ bi tutuu mbirika kɛkaa kyerɛɛ Moses
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Eldad nye Medad rehyɛ nkɔm wɔ nseraban no mu."

column2: "Na Nun ne babanyin Josua
column3: Moses no somfo no
column4: ɔyɛ ne mbanyin mpamufo mu kor no

column2: "Na Moses see no dɛ
column3: Ana emi ntsi erotwe nyinkun a? Ɔka mo nko a nkyɛ Nyankopɔn aama EWURADZE ne man nyinara ayɛ nkɔnhyɛfo
column4: ma EWURADZE dze no sunsum eegu hɔn do."

column2: "Na Moses sanee baa nseraban no mu
column3: ɔno nye Israel mpanyimfo no."

column2: "Na mframa fi EWURADZE nkyɛn bɔe
column3: na ɔdze Nkokɔhwerew fi po no ho boguu nseraban no ho
column4: bɛyɛ da kor akwantu wɔ afa ha
column5: nye da kor akwantu wɔ afa ha so
column7: na hɔn krɔn bɛyɛ basafa kor wɔ asaase enyi."

column2: "Na ɔman no soɛɛr adzekyee no nyinara
column3: nye anadwe no nyinara
column4: na wɔkɔboaboaa Nkokɔhwerew no ano: nyia ɔboaa kumaabi ano mpo
column5: onyaa  homer   du: na wɔhatahatae araa dze twaa nseraban no ho hyiae maa hɔnho."

column2: "Aber a nam no da ho wowɔ hɔn se mu a wonnyae nnkosae no
column3: EWURADZE ebufuw fraam ɔman no do
column4: na EWURADZE dze ɔyardɔm kɛsenara bobɔɔ ɔman no."

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ bea no dzin dɛ Kibrot-hataava
column3: osiandɛ hɔ na wosiee ɔman a hɔn kɔn dɔɔ adze no."
column4: "#1 Kor 10.6 #11.34 KIBROT-HATAAVA: Asekyerɛ nye: Akɔndɔ owumona."

column2: "Na ɔman no tui fii Kibrot-hataava kɔr Hazerot; na wɔtsenaa Hazerot."
